de.wota.utility

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.wota.utility.Vector

  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    Vector with two double components.

      double x
      x Coordinate
      double y

        public static Vector fromPolar(double amplitude,
               double direction)
        creates a vector from polar coordinates.
        Parameters:
        amplitude - length of the vector
        direction - phi-component. direction = 0 generates a vector along the x-axis.
        Returns:
        vector in x-y-coordinates
